summary: This is a retexture of Daedric Armor and Weapons, which intendes to darken them, and give them a more sinister vibe. They are weapons and armor from another realm, used by the dark lords in the plane of Oblivion right? Shouldn't they look like it?
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]

[center]This is a retexture of Daedric Armor and Weapons, which intendes to darken them, and give them a more sinister vibe. They are weapons and armor from another realm, used by the dark lords in the plane of Oblivion right? Shouldn't they look like it? The red glow of the Daedric objects is untouched, yet stands out a bit more as the items are darker, thus giving the glow more attention.[/center]

[center]Comments are more than welcome, and I'd also be interested in seeing my Daedric retexture when using different ENBs. Feel free to share any pics, and list your ENB, and any mods you think suit my retexture. [/center]

[center]Thanks in advance.[/center]

[center]I used [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9479363/?tb=mods&pUp=1]772135193[/url][/i] retexture of Daedric items as a base for my retexture because his\her work is simply awesome. It just didn't seem right creating a Daedric retexture of my own, using an inferior starting point. [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9479363/?tb=mods&pUp=1]772135193[/url][/i] set a new standard, and so, that is where I started. I have included all of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9479363/?tb=mods&pUp=1]772135193's[/url] original files, and so if you get tired of my retextures, you can revert to 772135193's. Please show your respects by checking out [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/9479363/?tb=mods&pUp=1]772135193[/url][/i] work.[/center]
author: Drail3
